Description.Text:
Property Location
Mercure Bordeaux Cité Mondiale Centre Ville is in the heart of Bordeaux, walking distance from Contemporary Art Museum and Les Quais. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Jardin Public and Quinconces Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 97 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and an elevator (lift). Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Mercure Bordeaux Cité Mondiale Centre Ville is in the heart of Bordeaux, walking distance from Contemporary Art Museum and Les Quais. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Jardin Public and Quinconces Square.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Contemporary Art Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Les Quais - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Jardin Public - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Quinconces Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Place des Quinconces - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bordeaux Wine and Trade Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Jardin Botanique - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Girondins Monument - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Natural History Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Maison du Vin de Bordeaux - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Bordeaux Wine School - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Grand Theater Opera National of Bordeaux - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Bordeaux Botanical Garden - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Palais Gallien - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Notre Dame Church - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Bordeaux (ZFQ-Saint-Jean SNCF Train Station) - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Bordeaux (BOD-Merignac) - 9.7 km / 6 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure Bordeaux Cité Mondiale Centre Ville is Bordeaux (BOD-Merignac).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Mercure Bordeaux Cité Mondiale is Bordeaux (BOD-Merignac) - 9.7 km / 6 mi.
